title: Heart Break Her
description: I know better than to get involved with celebrities. Especially a Rock God like Sebastian Kane. A man who knows how to make the ladies scream, as evidenced by the leak of his recent sex tape.Which leads to my problem... I'm the girl in the video with him.Grief will make you do crazy things. After all, I'm the smart girl, the good girl, not the rebel.But now I'm face to face with the one man I was never supposed to see again. A man with a gorgeous dark smile and even darker secrets.They say hindsight is 20/20.And that's the problem with rock stars.They make bad decisions so damn irresistible, right before they break your heart.
author: Eva  Simmons
